alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 6:19PM EDT until May 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Pike County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Peebles, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Peebles, Rarden, Poplar Grove, Ladd, Mount Joy, Elm Grove, Smoky Corners and Locust Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
